sourcesContent:
{{ displayMessage }}

Thank you for registering your child {{ name }}. We have send additional details to your email address {{ email }}. We will contact on your mobile at {{ mobile }} to confirm the demo class.

import { Component, Input } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-acknowledge', templateUrl: './acknowledge.component.html', styleUrls: ['./acknowledge.component.css'] }) export class AcknowledgeComponent { @Input() name: string; @Input() mobile: string; @Input() email: string; @Input() displayMessage: boolean; }
